Sentencas: Barium cerate is a candidate material for use in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and other solid-state ionic devices, due to its high proton conductivity in reduced-temperature operating conditions.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: The present paper investigates the crystal structure, surface and grain morphologies, particle size and distribution, and microstructural defects of both as-synthesized and heat-treated nanoparticles of barium cerate.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: Crystalline barium cerate was successfully synthesized in nanoparticle form using a relatively low-temperature wet chemistry route using hexamethylenetetramine.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction was carried out to understand the formation of various phases at different stages of processing.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: The evolution of the morphology and both the size and the shape of nanoparticles, were studied by high-resolution transmission electron microscopy after different heat-treatment temperatures.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: Nanoparticles are found to exhibit a cubic morphology after synthesis at 80 degrees C, and change to a mixed multi-faceted and equiaxed morphology as annealing temperature is increased to 800 degrees C. Crystallographically oriented surface steps can be observed at the surrounding edges of nanoparticles.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: Microstructural features, including edge dislocation and low-angle grain boundaries, are observed in some nanoparticles.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine

Sentencas: Possible mechanisms for nanoparticle formation and the effect of annealing temperature on morphological changes are discussed.
Titulo: Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanocrystalline Barium Cerate Using Hexamethylenetetramine
